This is the fixed version of my multigames map. After the css orange box update some maps were unplayable and the rounds never ended. I have now fixed them in this version and it runs fine with the new css update.
Map made for 66 tick erver
A server I played it on had some fucked up addons which caused the moving trains/ rotating things to slow down. Works fine on majority of servers.
############### ###############
About The Map This is a brand new multigame map consisting of 12 newly built maps;
  • Iceskate
  • Scoutsknives
  • AWP
  • Knife Arena
  • Sliderace
  • Grenade War
  • Bunny Hop
  • Xtreme Climb
  • Race
  • Jump Sliders
  • Block Dodge
  • Rotation Run
Map's
Spawn
 Get to the middle to get teleported to the top and choose a map. Spawn has blockable doors and spinning balls to try and stop players from getting to the middle. There is a build in bhop map in spawn, that have bunny hop steps to practice on. Random map chooser activates after 37 seconds.
Scoutsknives
 Use your scout and knife to kill the opposting team?
AWP
 AWP is set in the middle of a three train tunnels. Both sides are symetrical so there is n advantage over another team. The trains will kill you if they run you over and you can shoot through the trains.
Knife Arena
 Kind of like breakfloor, but its one layer of breaking blocks that take two right knife clicks to destroy. There are 3 HE grenades in the middle of the map.
SlideRace (Hard & Normal Mode)
 Use your A & D keys to slide through all the obstacles that are in your way to get to the end of the map. There are two different hardness modes on this map to choose from. Hard mode enables a third set of random doors and also makes the doors change more frequently. Its not that hard once you master it and use your 'S' key to slow you down at the doors.
Grenade War
 Pretty simple map, get a grenade from one of the 5 dispensers and kill the opposing team.
Bunny Hop
 Bunny Hop map with four different routes consisting of 3 levels. The levels get harder the further you get, allthough there pretty simple. Multibhop enabled to stop people jumping before you get on the bhop pad.
Xtreme Climb
 You are under the sea and must get to the surface of the water. You must work your way through 4 climb levels which gradually get more challanging. +15 kill points for making it to the top first.
Race
 A race map that you must get to the end of by passing various obstacles. There are some random obstacles to try and balance it out a bit, so people dont just one shot it everytime.
Jump Sliders
 You spawn in a cube and sliding bars slowly start to emerge, you must jump and crouch them otherwise it will teleport you to jail. After a while there will be 8 bars out and if you can survive this long then knifes will be given.
Block Dodge
 You again spawn in a room and have a few seconds before fast moving blocks come out of a wall. You have to dodge these for as long as possible, gradually the blocks will start to come out more frequently. Winners will get teleported on top of jail with paras/ knifes.
Rotation Run
 In this map you have to run around a circle standing on the LIGHT colored textures and not stand on the Darker textures. The darker textures will start to fall randomly every 2 seconds. A wall will rotate and you must stay behind it and not let it catch you up, otherwise you will get teleported. If you survive the whole rotating time then you will be given knifes to see who gets the para.
Sound Credits

Mg_Pauls_Minecraft_Course_V2 ############################ A very hard obstacle course map, I got bored of playing the same old maps and completing them the majority of times. I can see this being the same after a while, but its something fresh! ############## ########### Obstacles: 1. Dodge the minecarts (cant touch any part of them) 2. Moving Path (This is actually really easy, most people fail here. Just try to memorise the path and its easy) 3. Lava Jump (Dont jump too early) 4. Standard Jumping Stones. 5. Lava climb (climb upto the top before the lava gets you) 6. TNT Jump room 7. Spiral fall 8. Anti Gravity Beams (easy stage) 9. Anti Gravity Beams (Insane stage, never seen anyone apart from myself beat this yet) 10. Spiral Rise Although there are only 10 obstacles, there are a few unique and new ones in this map and they do take a while to complete each one. ####################QQ'ers/ RTV spammers################### I have installed a "QQ Corner" for you guys to sit in if you suck at trying to play minigames, enjoy. ###################################################### This map was made in about 8 hours (rushed) + about 4 hours of fixing it and adding some finishing touches. This map is a challange, enjoy. #####Change Log##### V2 - Fixed Major Bug
A new MG map who consists in differents platforms rooms

Parish Course
==================

You're trapped inside the Parish facility and have to find your way out!

v2 Changes
==================

- New secret that offers 1 player a custom skin or invis!
- Improved FPS
- Gravity fixed for only the player picking that award
- Edited room close to end
- Edited one of the first jumps
- Fixed pink reflectives for a few players
- Fixed barrel-trap not moving

Map Info
==================

- 3 Awards, Gravity, Speed and Points
- 3D skybox
- Music
- Lots of custom content
- Challenging traps and much more!

Video
==================
<iframe width="450" height="253" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FT2-xh_64TQ?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Paranormal course is a random course. You have to beat all levels and plant the bomb. Map Infos ------------------ 64 Spawns
15 Level Enjoy!

-15 Standard Levels + 2 Bonus Levels (1 you can reach in Level 1 in a Secret - The other one only in the Fun Zone)
-rising arduousness
-Big Fun Zone with many Secrets (take about 15 Minutes to see all if you know where they are!)
-Many coloured weapons

mg paper underwater
===================

Hello everyone and thanks for taking an interest in my map. I spent about a week creating this and hope everyone adds it to their servers and plays the hell out of it. The map has textures by sketchy, which present a graph "paper" effect with added drawings. Each level is enclosed in a glass box that is "underwater". The sky texture, by AmstaFF, gives a feel that the players are underwater.  It's a multigame map consisting of 5 different levels.

- **Level 1** - Race
- **Level 2** - A updated/modified mg g2 run
- **Level 3** - A modified "ROCK FALLS OF DEATH" by 3kliksphilip [Here](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IuZhT17TsC8 "")
- **Level 4** - Bunny Hop
- **Level 5** - Climb
###### 
**MUST** be on a noblock server
###### **MUST** have sv_airaccelerate 120 

Enjoy

Please comment/rate with constructive criticism. I'm new to mapping and want to improve.


Recommended on a NoBlock server -Come play on ours! -Gamers Guild Original Maps Server![NoBlock|Bhop|FastDL|Starwars] 66.151.244.188:27015

(update) gonna upload a new version fixing the powerup that i missed

this is the updated version with supports up to 15 players, up from 5. now the Ts move about 75% of normal speed (100%), or the CT "pacman" now moves about 25% faster then the Ts "ghosts"
and also made some changes to the powerup.

this is takeing from the map txt file.


IMPORTANT INFO: PRUT

This is a Pacman inspired level.
CT acts as Pacman seen from a top-down angle.
T acts as ghosts chasing Pacman, from First Person.
While CT can see the entire level, and hide from T, T can only see staright ahead, and will need to co-op to catch CT.

The objective for CT is to rescue the Hostages, and avoid the T, since he cannot harm them without gaining a Power up.
The Power up lasts for 15 seconds, and will cause an alarm to alert the T that CT is lethal.


RECOMMENTED CONTROL SETTINGS:

When playing as Pacman (CT), its recommented not to use the mouse. Use the following control scheme for the optimal experience:
MOVE: WASD
TURN (R/L): ARROW KEYS <- and ->
SHOOT: SPACE


we know the balanec might not be right but we were only 4 who could test it at a time.

upadte (24-04-2012). hi sry i hasnt been uploading anything latly havnt got the time to make anything on the map untill now. very soon im gonna upload an updated version supporting much more then just 5 players, not just 8, but 15! xD, for balance sake i also tryed something new. the new is that the Ts is now moveing slower. about 75% of normal speed. or said in a nother way the "pacman" is now moveing about 25% faster then the "ghots". and i tweaked the powerup. so now it last 12 secs, and you cant get the next powerup for 20 secs when you have takeing the 1st powerup.
if this works with so many more "ghots" i can easyly find a way to add more =) but for now this is a test =).


edidt: just uploaded an updatet version with the nav as i forgot that sry =)

this is takeing from the map txt file.

Objectives
    Cts:
    You start off with knives and must kill all the terrorists

    Ts:
    You must escape the cts for 3 minutes picking up pellets and mega pellets 
    counter the cts

Includes
-135 pellets that give you +1 score
-A mega pellet that gives you +15 score and a shotgun with 8 bullets that auto disappears in 10 seconds
-Custom sound effects\
-Noblock pliiis

Here is a version of pacman for CS:S. It's clean, polished and simple. I really liked the original maps by Adam Hawkins (flfpacman,flfmspacman,flfpacmanjr) and B4K73R1U5/Murd3rd0ll (cspacman), so I think this is a decent remake.
Two different versions of the map are included mg_pacman & mg_mspacman.

Gameplay: The ct's (pacmen) have to bring all the hostages (power pellets) into the middle of the map whilst the t's (ghosts) have to stop them.

Have fun.

It's a mini games  map

This is my third version of mg_outpost and actually the first one I am uploading on Fpsbanana.
This map took me roughly three days to create, and it's my first map I've ever done, so it looks very dull in apperance and plays pretty simple.

Features:
- 6 Terrorist Spawns
- 15 Counter-Terrorist Spawns
- Scout weaponspawner for the Terrorists, Grenade spawner for the CTs
- Terrorist are getting out of the building after 3 minutes
- Bunch of secret teleporters around the map that teleports you to some silly fun rooms.

This map was created for the Steamgamers Minigame Server


Edit: Fixxed version, added the song to it, didn't work before. If you downloaded it already, please redownload it!

What Do you Do?
The CT's start outside and must walk down the street (there is a slight push) as the T's shoot at them through the windows. The T's spawn in separate rooms in the building with a deagle and a windows to shoot from. Wen the CT's get inside, they receive guns to go kill the T's. Pretty simple, but most people seemed to love it.

This is the submission of HappyEntry for the Dangerous 
Cargo contest.


Redeye, Nice and I made one map each. This is the combined map of all 3, letting you choose 1 of 3 options for which one to play. Kind of like a multigame map.

Sadly, when we combined the maps some problems occured. For instance, some lighting went wrong, parts of the maps can be seen in the sky floating somewhere for some reason. A 3D skybox also didn't want to approve the moving of the maps. Tho, they work as intended.

We would of had fixed those errors, but the time was running out.

Like so many other maps, it has to be played at first and not just judged by the look. It is a minigame after all.

If you would like the .BSP from just one of the maps, that can be arranged. The carchase map is not missing it's background in the standalone file.

This map is obsolete, some tree textures are missing. And I can't fix it without having fixing the skybox going crazy. One of the 3 minigames can still be removed and without being affected by the problems with this map. Just PM.

Mg_office_course_2011:

This is an update of the old mg_office_course. The old map was to boring, so i made a new, and much more exciting version.

As a team you may complete different challenges to make your way to the end. If you complete the entire map, you will be able to find some select able goodies at the end.

Map specifications:

- Player slots: 64 - FPS: Around 200 - Lightning: Dynamic-lightning

Tips:

I will highly recommend new players, to try the map more then once, to get an insight in the challenges, and to learn how to play the map.

Credits:

Thanks to everyone who offered feedback and advices on this map. I hope you have fun!

Notification:

If you have any thing to comment on, please let me know.
I got the idea from TV tower, but now its in an office

Stay with the heat, lest you freeze to death quickly in the ocean. There are no weapons for either team, and the goal is to survive as flung blocks knock out sections of the playing field. It ran pretty well when tested on a server, so that shouldn't be a problem. I included the custom hdr skybox, custom soundscape, and color correction in the map file. Have fun.

Description:
The is like any other obstacle, 1 team (terrorist) trying to get past some jumpin levels (10), there are also some luck lvls. When a player gets to the final room, he/she will press a button that will kill everyone on the map, the winner will die slower. 

Suggestins:
Put roundlimit on this map to something like 8 - 12 minutes, takes some time to clear all 10 stages.

- Rats found their way to the christmas house.. -
mg_OAKS_rathouse_xmas
One brand new map and concept for MG
 Rats taking over the christmas house, will the locals be able to stop them?
- Mice 50HP have knifes, locals spawn with 150HP and a gun.
- Rattraps, randomly spawning in the house, don't get caught!
- Watch out for Miss Cat & Mister Dog, they love eating mice.
- Lots of secrets and many easter eggs, such as a plasma TV playing different popular shows.

All in a detailed styled appearance and quite a lot of props.
Tomgreen & Winter Worlds Mapping Contest!
 I started building this map a few days before the gamebanana's Winter World Mapping Contest and was very excited to participate in this contest. I did my best mapping two happy weeks straight to get this done. With the amazing help of MG mapper Tomgreen. He gave me this idea and made systems like the great and innovating weapon reset system, the surprising cats, the G man appearing in the chimney and the radio. The last days were pretty rough, we experienced a lot of issues with getting the modelindex of the rat to work but we made it through. Many (little) additions were the idea of Tomgreen and I'm very happy we both talked so much about this we became great mapping friends. Thanks a lot and I'm looking forward for another few collaborations in the future!
A sincere thank you goes to these lovely people:
  • Tomgreen - Level idea + Making the systems
  • zaCade - Offering great help in the end + Coming up with the (never used before) ragdoll kill system.
I'm so happy this map could be released the day before Christmas, have a gregarious time playing it. Enjoy the warm great christmas time with your beloved family and friends and have a nice time.

ProfessorOak

Add me on Steam!
Write something on my Gamebananaprofile

Changelog
 - Version 1: mg_OAKS_rathouse_xmas_b2 included a glitch, rat models were not correctly loaded on first map load. They only seemed to work on server's second map load. That (major) bug is now fixed in the final mg_OAKS_rathouse_xmas version. You might wanna redownload the map (:

- Also a few people asked me about the goal of the map, it's a mix of hide 'n seek and deathmatch! One team have knives, others have guns, check the screenshots!

And now I proudly present...
mg_OAKS_multigame_v1
12 unique levels!
 This map comes with twelve brand new levels!
- Dodging Lasers
- Vertical Sniping
- Football with a twist (1hp/100hp)
- Distance Jumping
- Flying Dutchman
- Crossing Trains
- Tricky Knife Battle
- Swinging Shotguns
- Western Shootout
- Underwater lab
- Shotgun Chase
- Oaker Race

All in a cute dev styled appearance and quite a lot of detail for a multigame. Inclusive a relaxing and carefree spawn with nice accordeon music and around the map are like 10 easter eggs.
Additional Information
 The file itself (.bsp) is quite big, we're talking 180mb. Not only does this map have a lot of custom content (models/materials/..), also 10 songs were added. I strongly recommend using fastdownload since the bz2 file will only be around 80mb. A detailed list of songs used in the map can be found here!

It took me a while to make this map, I started end december 2013.
A sincere thank you goes to these lovely people:
  • [SG] Paul - Great advice and offering his server to test.
  • Tomgreen - Level advice and giving me the waterlab idea.
  • zaCade - Amazing guy who helped me out a lot, especially at the end.
  • Cuniczek- Made the lovely counting system.
  • Steamgamers.com - Beta testing and simply the best MG server

To finish, this was my latest map for CS:S. I started mapping back in 2008 and ever since oaks laboratory was released, I became addicted to mapping. Life changed now, got pretty busy and don't have a lot time left. Enjoy this latest map and let me know how you liked it :)

Oak

After hours of work ProfessorOak presents..
mg_oaks_laboratory_fix
(sequel of mg_oaks_course)
Storyline
 Oaks Laboratory, founded by Professor Oak, was built in 1943.
Officially specialized in research and development of nuclear energy and radiation.

In the years, the company achieved great success and became one of the best-known laboratories.

Today, we're living in the year 1988. After a period of 45 years, a dangerous experiment turned out completely wrong, causing a leak in one of the reactors of the laboratory. Luckely this happened by night, only a few people died immediately after the disaster. Police enforcements evacuated the whole building but were not able to rescue the people in the deepest places of the lab.

You're still in there... In those dark areas of the laboratory. In only 240 seconds, you must find your way out without letting the biohazard radiation escape out of the building!
Important notes
 Map's pretty big (A 89 Megabyte .bsp file, including all custom textures, models and sounds)

For those who have no idea what this map's about, it's a course map!
The obstacles or traps are in my opinion not difficult (A beta testing prooved the diffrent!). It's more about the fact of completing it by 240 seconds.

Obstacles are created with an eye to realism. Those traps could exist in real life, you won't see flying platforms and such.

When someone finishes the map, everyone will get teleported (+Gunstripper) to a room where they'll see a truck (transporting the player who finished the map) passing by. The winner gets an m4a1, friendly fire will be enabled for him, can't be something else but fun! Each teamkill, one extra kill for the winner + Receiving a bonus 999 kills.

Not completing the map in time will have a huge plane crash as result (screen 2), letting the biohazard radiation to escape out of the building.
Special Thanks
I'd like to thank everyone who made this possible:
  • zaCade - General help and advice.
  • Keamon - Helped me out with the gun resetter.
  • LilHa - Creating all custom textures.
  • ZwiebelBitch - End idea (Truck & Hello Kitty room) + Nice to chat with!
  • [SG] Paul - Advice, testing and beta testing. Idea of modified round: after someone completes the map, a teleport in level 2 will become available.
  • Acehigh - Testing, Ideas. (Monster (Plane) idea)
  • ...
  • Tweakgaming.com (Beta testing, support)
  • Steamgamers.com (Beta testing)
Walktrough, made by Rubber Johnny! Well-done, though he's not always using the correct way of passing a level!

Hereby I proudly present...
mg_OAKS_cruiseship_v2*
One classic, though minigame, bomb-defuse map.
 The whole idea is just that everything takes places in and around a big cruiseship.
- With a lot of surf.
- Even more things (conveyors) that boost you up.
- Two yachts, including two different T spawnpoints.
- A bunch of little secrets.
- A stage, with relaxing music.
- A cruiseship's bridge, or cockpit (bombtarget).
- Much more to explore
- Oh.. and a football, I almost forgot.

All in a cute dev styled appearance and quite a lot of detail for a minigame.
Additional Information
 It took me a few days to make this map, I never thought I'd make new maps after my latest multigame.. but meh, couldn't hold myself.
Map's inspired by Tomgreen's mg_ski_mountain. I talked with this guy a lot to make the game play better and that was really helpful.
A sincere thank you goes to these lovely people:
  • Tomgreen - Level advice, great help and nice to chat with.
  • [SG] Paul - Offering his server to test, nice person in general.
  • Steamgamers.com - Beta testing and simply the best MG server.
  • Hoecommunity.com - Nice MG server with a lot of players.

Changelog FIX*: - Going through the yacht won't hurt you anymore - Got rid of the gun reset system - Added heal zone in the back - Made the lower area smaller - Few other minor things Rate, comment w/e let me know how you like it! Enjoy! :)

Oak

*** MG_OAKS_COURSE ***

Map made by ProfessorOak - Tweakgaming.com

Notes:
Map consists of 12 (difficult) levels.
Skills are needed to complete this map.

Respawning is possible.
You can respawn until someone presses a button to close the gate in level 4. (+ Console message).
Respawn by joining spectators followed by joining Terrorist.

Full-English 
All Console commands are English


Level 1:
Climb (Easy)

Level 2: 
Make your way trough the moving obstacles (Hard)

Level 3: 
Jump on the pilars. Try not to get hit by the moving obstacle. (Hard)

Level 4: 
Jump on the box. Evade the metal pipes. Strafe to the left while running forward to jump on a metal pipe. Continue going forward will destroy the platform and will kill you.

Go into the vent. Break the vent which is lower than the other vents.
Jump on another moving box and break into the control room. (Hard)

(In the control room, there is this button to close the maingate which disables respawning.)

Level 5:
Climb to above, jumping from ladder to ladder. If you miss a ladder, you'll fall down and lose HP. (Quite easy)

Level 6: 
Get to the ground, by jumping on the one-by-one spawning boxes. 

Press the right button (HINT: It's always the button right to the button with the sparks) (Hard)


Level 7
PART 1:
Evade lasers. Touching the lasers will get you killed. (Easy)

PART 2:
Make your way trough the obstacles while the trigger push is pushing you to the other platforms. At the end, there is this spectacular jump. Big fun if you make it. (Hard)

PART 3:
Try to jump on the rope. Climb to above (Easy)

Level 8
Tunnel with cars. Cars are moving forward. Make your way trough the moving cars and evade the pilars in the middle of the tunnel. Cars are horning. (Hard)

Level 9:
Go to the top of the stairs-room. Try not the fall down (Quite easy)

Break one of the hinges to make the door go open. (Easy)

Level 10: 
Try to know how the secret course works. HINT: (Look at the ceiling and follow a path..) (Easy)

Level 11: 
The final door will be locked. If you want it to go open, the ceiling will break, the glass will break because there are 2 gigantic balls rolling towards to you. Try to find a spot as fast as possible to stay alive. (Hard)

Level 12:
Final Level:

Choose a button. Choosing the right button gives you 1000 kills. Choosing the wrong one, makes you go BOOM! (Easy...)

NOTE:
Map tested on Tweakgaming.com server with 32 players (No-Block enabled!)
Big fun we had!

I hope this map will have success and I look towards to play it in your server. (Please tell me your server IP if you downloaded this map!)

NOTE:
Map has got 8 secrets.

Enjoy! (8 MB > 3 MB music)
(Last Screenshot is a screenshot taken out of the map.)

Another OAKS creation...
mg_OAKS_chutes_n_ladders_v1
A 35HP knife map with chutes and ladders!
 Kids were moved out of the kindergarten, making place for bad men
- Ladders, allowing you to climb.
- Chutes, taking you back down and give you a boost.
- Relaxing music (Daft punk)
- Original "Chutes 'n Ladders" song. God, I like that.
- Shotguns OR knife-fight in a smaller area after 140 seconds.
- A few secrets.
- Much more to explore

All in a cute dev styled appearance. Thanks to nyro for these awesome textures.
Additional Information
 Tomgreen gave me this idea. Thanks a lot, hope you like it.
A sincere thank you goes to these lovely people:
  • Tomgreen - Level idea, great help and nice to chat with.
  • Hoecommunity.com - Nice MG server with a lot of players.

Rate, comment w/e let me know if you like it! Enjoy! :)

Hello, 

I'm NeoX and i had to recreate an account for publish any project of maps because i lost my password for the account "NeoX[F]77" and, at 14/02/2016, i take the decision to remake my personal map (mg_neox_course_2_rfix) for a big remake of that. I used the Reacz textures (Like for mg_neox_course_2_rfix). For me it's a big remake because i just think of the map mg_neox_course_2 which are my map and i create another map based to that.

There are 5 Sounds (4 played random at the round start and 1 for the bonus).

- Bonus - Helen Corry - Time

- Main - Alan Walker - Faded

- Main - Grabbitz - Way Too Deep

- Main - Major Lazer - Light It Up

- Main - Stephen Swartz - Bullet Train

They are 64 info_player_terrorists.

Bsp size : 53015 Ko ~ 53 Mo

Have fun D:

I've posted beta4 about a year ago and I forgot that in meanwhile I've made a final version of it, so here it is.

_aChangeLog.text: Removed some details of the levels due to the limitation of the engine
Reduced the size of the cubemap with a 32x on 16x
Changed all entities from func_brush to func_detail

_sText:
Another version of the map.

The standard version of the map - https://gamebanana.com/maps/196990

Easy version of the map - https://gamebanana.com/maps/197042

_aChangeLog.text: Added possibility to control the brightness and mute it. Commands for brightness mat_autoexposure_max , clean sound snd_restart

_sText: The map is created under the style of the middle ages. Each of the levels consist of unique styles and each of them are different. Map decided to create a medium complexity. Map tested many times and was looking for flaws and bugs, and corrected them. The map does not contain holes. The map is medium in size, but because of the limitations of the engine no longer possible to create more detailed levels and the number of them. The map was built I.The map is created with the "cubemap" and "HDR"
A simplified version of the map. Standard version, see https://gamebanana.com/maps/196990
